duties_responsibilities.duty: Support the owner and leadership team in administrative and project-related activities.
Manage project-related activities, documentation, and communication using DASH software.
Accurately manage financial transactions with bookkeeping expertise.
Utilize Xactimate software for accurate project cost estimation.
Prioritize tasks effectively and manage multiple projects concurrently.
Interact with internal teams, clients, and stakeholders with strong written and verbal communication skills.
Adapt to changing priorities and situations with a problem-solving mindset.
Work independently and as part of a collaborative team with a proactive and self-driven work ethic.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration or related field (Certification in Bookkeeping is a plus)
